original_title: 「先生、私、進学します」進路まで決めてくれた大事な恩師とデリヘルバイトで再開。 ゆい
overview: An advisor teacher who helped me to go on to higher education. She goes on to a famous physical education university, but her living expenses are not enough and she has no choice but to start deli. One day, what came out of the door was ... the adviser teacher who decided my life. "What are you doing here?" At the moment when I was threatened [a sweaty meat stick pierces her throat! ] A teacher who hurries up with an immediate scale option. "Open your mouth more! I'm a guest!" A lot of ruthless greedy play that lost sexual desire and collapsed reason. (I will nominate you from tomorrow).
title: 'Teacher, I Will Continue Studying' She Meets Her Respected Teacher Again Who Helped Her with Her Studies at Her Call Girl Job. Yui
